groups.name: grpc.client
groups.description:
A container for named channel properties.
Each channel has its own configuration. If you try to get a channel that does not have a configuration yet, it will be created. If something is not configured in the channel properties, it will be copied from the global config during the first retrieval. If some property is configured in neither the channel properties nor the global properties then a default value will be used.

groups.name: grpc.client.GLOBAL
groups.description: The channel properties for a single named gRPC channel or service reference. In this case the GLOBAL channel.

groups.name: grpc.client.GLOBAL.security
groups.description: A container with options for the channel's transport security. In this case the GLOBAL channel's ones.

properties.name: grpc.client.GLOBAL.address
properties.description:
Sets the target address uri for the channel.
The target uri must be in the format: schema:[//[authority]][/path].
If nothing is configured then the io.grpc.NameResolver.Factory will decide on the default.
Examples:
	"static://10.0.0.10:9090,10.11.12.11:9091",
	"dns:/example.com:9090",
	"discovery:/foo-service"

properties.name: grpc.client.GLOBAL.keep-alive-time
properties.description:
The default delay before we send a keepAlive.
Default unit is seconds.

properties.name: grpc.client.GLOBAL.keep-alive-timeout
properties.description:
The default timeout for a keepAlives ping request.
Default unit is seconds.

properties.name: grpc.client.GLOBAL.keep-alive-without-calls
properties.description: Whether keepAlive will be performed when there are no outstanding RPC on a connection.

properties.name: grpc.client.GLOBAL.max-inbound-message-size
properties.description:
The maximum message size in bytes allowed to be received by the channel.
If not set (null) then it will default to gRPC's default.
If set to -1 then it will use the highest possible limit (not recommended).

properties.name: grpc.client.GLOBAL.full-stream-decompression
properties.description: Whether full-stream decompression of inbound streams should be enabled.

properties.name: grpc.client.GLOBAL.negotiation-type
properties.description: The negotiation type to use on the connection.

properties.name: grpc.client.GLOBAL.security.client-auth-enabled
properties.description: Whether client can authenticate using certificates.

properties.name: grpc.client.GLOBAL.security.certificate-chain-path
properties.description:
The path to SSL certificate chain. Required if "client-auth-enabled" is enabled.
The linked certificate will be used to authenticate the client.

properties.name: grpc.client.GLOBAL.security.private-key-path
properties.description: The path to the private key. Required if "client-auth-enabled" is enabled.

properties.name: grpc.client.GLOBAL.security.trust-cert-collection-path
properties.description:
The path to the trusted certificate collection.
If not set (null) it will use the system's default collection (Default).
This collection will be used to verify server certificates.

properties.name: grpc.client.GLOBAL.security.authority-override
properties.description: Sets the authority to check for during server certificate verification. By default the clients will use the name of the client to check the server certificate's common + alternative names.
